comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Thanks, this is much appreciated!
Committed  in revision 219757 with a small note about the top level multiproject setup.

comments.author: Michael Wechner
comments.body:
I think we should also add a jaas.config and mention the JAVA_OPTS within the README:

JAVA_OPTS="-Djava.security.auth.login.config==.....jaas.config"

I will add another patch ...

summary: Improved READMEs for building sequence of trunk and jcr-server
